author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify many of the loops as Range ased loops in Calibration/HcalCalibAlgos as suggested by Tamas

#### PR validation:

Checked using test workflows in the test areas of Calibration/HcalAlCaRecoProducers and Calibration/HCalCalibAlgos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca213X Modify many of the loops as Range ased loops in Calibration/HcalCalibAlgos
